5012.name: Unknown
5012.message:
The connection with the server was lost.

Before you can use this online service,
you must start Miiverse at least once.

Please start Miiverse from the
HOME Menu.
5012.short_description: Connection is unstable or Juxtaposition account not initialized.
5012.long_description: Your connection is unstable or your Juxtaposition account has been not initialized.
5012.short_solution: Boot the Miiverse applet from the home screen and complete setup, then try again.
5012.long_solution: Boot the Miiverse applet from the home screen and complete setup, then try again.
